channel.title: [317] Client Guys help please!
channel.description: Right. I want to make my own runescape private server i got source and client they are working fine but i want that people can download my client for example from mediafire run it and play. But what i need to do to my client that other people can run it and when they press login button that they connect to my server. i got my port forwarded and i got no-ip. guys help please

item.title: [317] Client Guys help please!
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Dutch Owner Dutch
item.description:
@Owner_Dutch wrote:

Change ur ip in Client.java Than make it Rar and upload it.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Client Guys help please!
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

Your going to need to make a batch file that fits that java specifications and sometimes the OS. Look at what other servers are doing when they release a client.

You can also make a webclient.

This should be in client help btw.

Read full topic
